Text:
Previous 1080p upload was done with the commentary audio track. 
This was an accidental mistake. and this torrent is now fixed with the proper audio track.

No, we do not make these mistakes on purpose. 
We upload around 6 movies a day, its not possible to test every film we upload for our users. 
Never the less, sorry about any wasted internet traffic spent on previous faulty version

Yes, this does have Cinavia on it. If you want a version without Cinavia on it, you must wait until a DVDRIP comes out. 

And yes, we know the audio isn't loud enough. That's what happens when a movie file is compressed to a size like this one. Its a audio for size sacrifice. Learn to deal with it. 

No one stops you from going out and wasting $20 for the real thing.

Hoping to pick someones brain on the following

I play all my stuff through Windows Media Player on my XBOX 360. 

The XBOX does not like blu ray movies. I get audio but video never loads. 

Same thing on a few BR movies I've downloaded. 

I've messed around with Hand break but only seem to make the file even larger.

Does anyone know how to convert this BR movie using Hand Break into a format that the XBOX will play?

Is there an update that I can do on the XBOX? 

I have great disdain for the XBOX and would rather just have done with done with it and convert the BR to another format.

I appreciate any assistance :)
